content: **december hat of the month club time ** 3 brand-new designs are available for you this month including my here we come hat pattern links to the patterns are in my blog post here https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2020/12/2021-here-we-come-hat html > > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized with ads > if you prefer to purchase an ad-free > pdf copy you can get it right here on > ravelry > this easy-to-crochet hat pattern can be made quickly and with only 84 yds of bulky weight yarn \ 5\ that means 1 one single cake you can make 3 adult hats the hat is warm and cozy and matches perfectly with last week s cowl pattern 2021 here we come cowl this project takes less than 2 hours to crochet **yarn color ** gold fusion have fun rhondda xo
